parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Local Lennox S30 Hostname or IP Address.

parameter.name: protocol
parameter.label: Protocol
parameter.description: Protocol to connect to the Lennox Thermostat (http or https).

parameter.name: useSelfSignedCertificate
parameter.label: Use Self-Signed Certificate
parameter.description: Use self-signed certificate for HTTPS connection to Lennox Thermostat.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The interval in seconds for refreshing the data from Lennox S30 system

parameter.name: initialRefreshDelay
parameter.label: Initial Refresh Delay
parameter.description: The interval in seconds for initial delay before startign refresh cycle, allow data to be processed from Lennox S30 system

parameter.name: pumpInterval
parameter.label: Pump Interval
parameter.description: The interval in seconds for requesting the data from Lennox S30 system

parameter.name: appID
parameter.label: Application ID
parameter.description: Application ID used to connect to Lennox Thermostat, randomly generated at the first connection.
